Language barriers and communication difficulties in foreign countries, causing misunderstandings and missed connections.
Culture shock and discomfort in unfamiliar environments, causing anxiety and stress.
Difficulty maintaining a healthy diet and exercise routine while on the go, leading to unhealthy eating habits and decreased physical activity.
Pressure to constantly be "on" and available for work or leisure activities, leading to burnout and decreased work-life balance.
Difficulty navigating unfamiliar transportation systems and finding reliable transportation options, leading to delays and frustration.
